TIM BENNIKS

Home work blog about me

A selection of my work

BigAirBag

The BigAirBag is the common professional safety product in the freestyle parks around the world.

The project has been a collaboration with my Mates Mark and Pieter Frank. These guys did an awesome job with the back-end and the design. I have taken care of the front-end.

Thomas Vording Photography

Thomas is an up and coming fashion photographer from Amsterdam. This guy has some mad skills and it was hard to say no to building his portfolio.
